definitions.example: I didn't like that book, so I gave it away.

definitions.definition: To formally hand over a bride to the bridegroom; often by her father.
definitions.example: Who giveth away this woman to this man in Holy matrimony?

definitions.definition: (sometimes reflexive) To unintentionally reveal a secret, divulge undisclosed information, or expose someone.
definitions.example: He gave away his hiding place when he accidentally sneezed.

definitions.definition: To concede an advantage in weight, time, height etc.
definitions.example: Despite giving away twenty pounds in weight, the challenger found a knock-out blow in the second round.
